title.rendered: Alexis Mabille. SS 2023 during Haute Couture Week.

content.rendered:
Alexis Mabille. Color Addict Spring Summer 2023 Couture Collection during Haute Couture Week.

For his Haute Couture Spring-Summer 2023,

Alexis Mabille presents a 36 looks collection. 

The theme "Color Addict" is fully represented with a diverse colour palette. 


Text and Photo: Press Alexis Mabille

More on: www.alexismabille.com @alexismabille

Thanks: OBCM @obcmparis


By Senior Fashion Editor 24FashionTV: Christina V Henningstad @christina_henningstad
